## TextCanvas.addLayer() method

Creates a new `TextCanvas` rendering layer and returns. If there was already a layer for the input `layerId`<!-- -->, it just returns this one instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addLayer(layerId: number): TextCanvasLayer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  layerId | number | Desired layer identifier. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TextCanvasLayer](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvaslayer.md)

Created \[\[TextCanvasLayer\]\].
